meanings.definition: A Middle Eastern dish made from mashed chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, and garlic.
meanings.sent1: I love to eat hommos with pita bread.
meanings.sent2: The hommos at the restaurant was creamy and delicious.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone fought over the last scoop of hommos.
meanings.sent4: The hommos spread smoothly on the toast, like a cloud of flavor.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly made hommos filled the kitchen.

meanings.sent2: She enjoys hommos with her family on weekends.
meanings.sent3: I hommosed so much yesterday that I ran out of chickpeas.
meanings.sent4: His love for hommos is as strong as his love for pizza.
meanings.sent5: The chef hommosed a new recipe that became an instant hit.
